Class ViewForgottenPassword

java.lang.Object
guiForgttenPassword.ViewForgottenPassword
public class ViewForgottenPassword extends Object

Title: ViewForgottenPassword Class.

Description: The ViewForgottenPassword Page is used to enable a potential user with an One Time Password to change thier password after they have specified the one time password on the standard login page.

Copyright: Jonathan Stark Â© 2026

  • Method Details

    • displayForgotPass

      public static void displayForgotPass(javafx.stage.Stage ps, User user)

      Method: displayForgotPass(Stage ps, User user)

      Description: This method is the single entry point from outside this package to cause the ViewForgottenPassword page to be displayed. It first sets up very shared attributes so we don't have to pass parameters. It then checks to see if the page has been setup. If not, it instantiates the class, initializes all the static aspects of the GUI widgets (e.g., location on the page, font, size, and any methods to be performed). After the instantiation, the code then populates the elements that change based on the user and the system's current state. It then sets the Scene onto the stage, and makes it visible to the user.

      Parameters:
      ps - specifies the JavaFX Stage to be used for this GUI and it's methods
      user - specifies the user's invitation code for this GUI and it's methods
